s1.ptxt: Lift up vehicle and drain oil from rear differential.
Remove rear propeller shaft referring to Propeller Shaft Removal and Installation .
Remove exhaust center pipe referring to Exhaust System Components .
Remove rear drive shafts referring to Rear Drive Shaft Assembly Removal and Installation:Rear .
Support rear differential with transmission jack.
Remove front and rear mounting bolts, and then lower rear differential.

servinfosub.title: Remounting
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse dismounting procedure for remounting noting the following.

item.ptxt: Tighten rear differential mounting front and rear bolts to specified torque.
Fill rear differential oil referring to Rear Differential Oil Change:Rear .
